verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Njooni twende
nyumbani mwake
Bwana anatuita twende,
Njooni nyote tuingie,
tumwombe mahitaji,
Tumshukuru Mungu wetu,
njoni tumwabudu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Anatuita tukamwimbie,
wimbo mpya kwa shangwe kuu;
(Njoni nyote tushangilie,
tuimbe kwa furaha. x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nawe ndugu usipomwimbia,
atafanya mawe yaimbe;
(Yamsifu milele yote,
Bwana Mungu wetu. x2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nyumba ya Bwana milango wazi,
njooni nyote tukaingie;
(Tumwabudu tukamwombe,
Bwana Mungu wetu. x2)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tumtolee sadaka safi,
Mungu wetu Baba Mwenyezi;
(Tujitoe sisi wenyewe,
kwake Mungu Baba. x2)
